title: Article 1
article: A mobile app that will send you notifications whenever a concert is playing in your area.

title: Article 2
article: A web app that will give users 10 new technical questions each day and track their progress in things like programming, cybersecurity, database architecture, and more!

title: Article 3
article: A game for Windows and macOS where players move a ball through a series of increasingly challenging mazes.
